description: A man takes two forms of vitamin supplements to get his vitamin B and vitamin D requirements . He needs at least 14 units of vitamin B and 24 units of vitamin D. Per serving , a gummy vitamin contains 2 units of vitamin B and 7 units of vitamin D. Per serving , a powder vitamin contains 6 units of vitamin B and 2 units of vitamin D. If the cost per serving for a gummy vitamin is $ 1 and the cost per serving of powder vitamin is $ 3 , how many of each should he take to minimize his cost ?
